## About this website

::: {focus-on="cr-profile"}
[**Goals**]{style="color:#f7786b;"} - Writing about my career as a Business & Process Improvement Analyst - Using machine learning models and GenAI to incorporate lean principles, PDCA method and quality tools creating solutions to improve manufacturing processes - Using R and Python to solve real problems in data science field - Create a educational content for my niece Alexis and my nephew Noah who are studying robotics in Japan - Build the foundations for my PhD research that investigates the factors that impact competitiveness, personal development, and management capacity in manufacturing processes during changing economic cycles. [**Education**]{style="color: #9D0F6A ;"} - Master's Degree in Agro-industrial Production & Management - Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration [**Experience**]{style="color: #9D0F6A ;"} - Process Improvement and Lean principles - Business Intelligence - Strategic Planning - Data Science - Philosophy - Statistics and Machine Learning Models
:::

::: {#cr-mtcars}



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)


mtcars %>% 
  mutate(vs = ifelse(vs == 0,"V engine","Straigth engine")) %>% 
  ggboxplot(x = "vs",  y= "mpg", fill = "vs")+
  stat_compare_means(aes(label = after_stat(p.signif)))
```
